title: vehicle_allocation_notification_form_fser-c930-0103
text: VEHICLE ALLOCATION NOTIFICATION FORM (FSER– C930 – 0103) ../../2023 Due to your role as ………………………………………….., the following vehicle has been allocated to you by SABANCI UNIVERSITY as an office/service vehicle Annex: Copy of driver’s license I agree that I have read and understood the "Vehicle Allocation and Use Procedure" presented to me in the Annex and that I have received the vehicle. Distribution: Services Unit / Transportation Services (Original) Human Resources Directorate (Copy) Vehicle user (Copy)
